title: Ai no Wakakusa Monogatari
opening_song: #1: "Wakakusa no Shoutaijou (若草の招待状)" by Eri Nitta (eps 01-14)
ending_song: #1: "Sekiyou to Kaze to Melody (夕陽と風とメロディ)" by Eri Nitta (eps 01-14)
sinopse: Meg, faithful and gentle, Jo, independent and energetic, Beth, quiet and shy, Amy, amiable and precocious–the four sisters live vigorously and happily at home with their gentle mother while waiting for their father to return from the Civil War. Helping each other, they challenge their fates and grow up to become wonderful women.
